roleset.name: amuse
roleset.note: ENTERTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entertain' based on annotation-on-the-fly on the financialsubcorpus. (from entertain.01-v predicate notes)
ENTERTAINED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from entertained.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: John can entertain himself for hours with a piece of string and a stick.
example.arg: with a piece of string and a stick

example.name: Strange adjectival realization, affected by "happy"
example.text: I-5 do nt expect PRO-5 to be entertained and happy to potter around or go to a National Trust / Swimming , but my local pool doe ns't have an open swim on thurs suitable for my availability and i do n't have a car free to drive .
example.arg: to potter around or go to a National Trust / Swimming

roleset.name: consider
roleset.note: ENTERTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entertain' based on annotation-on-the-fly on the financialsubcorpus. (from entertain.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Judge Curry wouldn't entertain any appeals or other attempts to block his orders.
example.arg: any appeals or other attempts to block his orders.
